Plot: An overview of the characters and legends that circulate the carnival of Sao Luiz do Paraitinga, Brazil. Where music, tradition and imagination not only inhabit the minds of the local ...
Title: Eu Sou o Coração do Carnaval
Writer: Ricardo Devecz (story), Ricardo Devecz, Jairo Neto (story), Jairo Neto, Marcel Rocha (story), Marcel Rocha, Gabriel de Paula (story), Gabriel de Paula
